mapper.select: select * from usertable where ((userId=#{userId}) and (pwd=#{pwd}) and (email_key='Y'))
mapper.insert: insert into usertable (userName, userId, pwd, gender, email1, email2, zipcode, addr1, addr2, tel1, tel2, tel3) values (#{userName}, #{userId}, #{pwd}, #{gender}, #{email1}, #{email2}, #{zipcode}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{tel1}, #{tel2}, #{tel3})
mapper.select: select * from newzipcode where sido like '%'||#{sido}||'%' and nvl(sigungu,'0') like '%'||#{sigungu}||'%' and roadname like '%'||#{roadname}||'%'
mapper.insert: update usertable set email_key = #{email_key} where userId = #{userId}
mapper.update: update usertable set email_key = 'Y' where userId = #{userId} and email_key = #{email_key}
mapper.select: select count(*) from usertable where kakaoId=#{kakaoId}
